about.title: About Me
about.headline: Expert at Solving Complex Problems with Technology
about.subtitle: I transform business challenges into scalable solutions that generate real results and measurable impact
about.intro: My passion isn't writing code — it's solving problems. With over a decade turning complex challenges into growth opportunities, I've learned that technology is just the means, not the end. What drives me is seeing businesses thrive, teams grow, and ideas come to life.

photo.caption: MongoDB 2024 - I love technologies that solve real business problems

journey.title: How I Solve Problems
journey.p1: My approach starts with questions, not code. I deeply understand the business problem before proposing any technical solution. This mindset allowed me to architect and scale projects from scratch that became pillars of fast-growing companies.
journey.p2: I master multiple technologies — JavaScript/TypeScript, React, Node.js, Python, Golang, Flutter — but not as a hobby. Each tool in my arsenal was chosen because it solves a specific type of problem better than others. I don't get attached to technologies; I get attached to results.
journey.p3: I lead teams, manage agile procedures, and make strategic technical decisions as a CTO. But my greatest value is in connecting the dots: between what the business needs, what technology can do, and what the team can deliver.

integrations.title: Solution Arsenal
integrations.description: Each integration below solved a specific business problem — from automating processes to scaling operations globally:

categories.ai: Intelligence & Automation: OpenAI, ChatGPT, Dall-E, Whisper, Leonardo AI — eliminating manual work and amplifying human capabilities
categories.payments: Global Monetization: Stripe, Cryptomus, NoxPay, Apple Store API — processing millions in secure transactions
categories.communication: Scale Reach: Twilio, WhatsApp API, SES, SendGrid — connecting businesses with millions of users
categories.infrastructure: Critical Performance: Redis, RabbitMQ, SQS, SNS, ElasticSearch — ensuring speed even under pressure
categories.cloud: Scalable Infrastructure: AWS, GCP, Heroku, S3, Firebase — from MVP to global scale
categories.monitoring: Total Visibility: New Relic, DataDog, Grafana — anticipating problems before users feel them
categories.security: Proactive Protection: HaveIBeenPwned, Leakcheck, Dehashed — securing data and reputation

community.title: Multiplying Impact
community.description: I believe knowledge not shared is knowledge wasted. That's why I transformed the habit of learning into a commitment to teach. Each workshop is a chance to plant seeds of transformation in other careers.

community.passion: I did this for them today, and I hope they can do the same for others in the future. It's rewarding to share knowledge and see people growing professionally.

about.pride: My greatest pride isn't the lines of code I wrote — it's the companies that scaled, the teams that led with autonomy, and the impossible problems that became success stories. Projects that started as sketches on whiteboards now serve millions of users globally.
about.philosophy: I'm driven by challenges that seem too big, deadlines that seem too tight, and problems no one has solved yet. My mindset is simple: if there's a better way, I'll find it. If there isn't, I'll create it.
about.cta: If you have a complex problem that needs someone who thinks beyond the obvious, let's talk. I won't promise it'll be easy — but I will promise it'll get solved.
